channel.title: NPC's won't talk. Or move.
channel.description:
I turned on HL 2 today (after about a month or so of not playing) and I decided to play from the begining again. I got to Gman, and he just stood there, looking around. He made no noise. All you could hear is the background noise.
When the gman scene ended, I tried to talk to the NPC with the brief case on the train by the door, and he just looked at me. The same happened with the other one. They never exited the train after it stopped moving.
Dr. Breen never came up on the screen, and Alyx doesn't move. And neither does Barney. Pretty much nobody does anything. All of these things work fine in EP 1 and Ep 2.
Any Ideas?
I have tried uninstalling and reinstalling it, defragging it, trying it on a different computer, enabling and turning off the cloud, and restarting steam to no avail.
